pages.text: For every Block of Copper, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.45 * 2
For every Block of Iron, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.6 * 2
For every Block of Gold, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.95 * 0.5
For every Block of Amethyst, points are added to the total according to:$(br)min(blocks, 8) * 8
For every Block of Emerald, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.95
For every Block of Diamond, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.75 * 5
For every Block of Netherite, the total number of points is multiplied by:$(br)1 + (blocks * 0.05)
